gov.sandia.rbb.ui.chart
Class TimeseriesXYChart

java.lang.Object
  org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart
      gov.sandia.rbb.ui.chart.TimeseriesXYChart
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, org.jfree.chart.event.PlotChangeListener, org.jfree.chart.event.TitleChangeListener, org.jfree.ui.Drawable
public class TimeseriesXYChart
extends org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart

Plot RBB Timeseries against time. This is provided from the command-line as a utility, since it seems like a common use case. However, there are so many variations on how data can be drawn that many applications will probably want to just use this as example code; It would be a waste of time to re-package or encapsulate the full flexibility of JFreeChart.

See Also:

Method Detail

getCombinedPlot

public final org.jfree.chart.plot.CombinedDomainXYPlot getCombinedPlot()

draw

public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2,
                 java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D chartArea,
                 java.awt.geom.Point2D anchor,
                 org.jfree.chart.ChartRenderingInfo info)
This is overridden simply to add the 'synchronized' keyword. When the plots must be reconstructed due to a change to the RBB, that occurs in a thread just for that purpose. The changes trigger drawing which is done in the UI thread. Bad things happen if the UI thread isn't forced to wait until reconstructSubPlots is finished.

Overrides:
draw in class org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
This is for calling ChartMain from the command line - from java code call ChartMain directly instead. If there is an exception, this main prints out the message and aborts the program with an error code.

ChartMain

public static void ChartMain(java.lang.String[] args)
                      throws java.lang.Throwable
Creates a top-level window containing a chart for the specified data. unlike main(), ChartMain() propagates exceptions so it is more useful for calling from other code or unit tests. To call it from other code you will typically: import static gov.sandia.rbb.ui.TimeseriesChart;

Throws:
java.lang.Throwable
